title: DostiHub - A quick and interesting way to share your life
description: DostiHub - is a free app that makes it easy to share photos and videos with friends and family. Apply filters to your images and share on social media like Facebook and Twitter. Discover a new way to see the world!
keywords: DostiHub, share life, photos, videos, filters, social media, free app
h2: Capture and share moments of the world
p1: DostiHub - is a quick, beautiful, and interesting way to share your life with friends and family.
p2: Take a photo or video, choose a filter to change it, and post on DostiHub - it's that easy. You can also share on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, and more. It's a new way to see the world.
p3: Oh, did we mention it's free?
